abilities.description:
When you seize a notable ship or treasure, roll +wits. On a strong hit, take both, or choose one twice. On a weak hit, choose one. On a miss, choose one, but this prize also brings an unexpected danger; @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.78baa51694fe37c5]{Pay the Price}.

  • Build your fortune: Mark 1 tick on your quests legacy track.
  • Share the spoils: Mark 1 tick on your bonds legacy track.

When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.ed490d43a2533506]{Set a Course} for familiar hunting grounds or to intercept a specific target, you may reroll your action die if its value is less than your shipâ€™s integrity. When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} by sailing an area in search of prey, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
You may spend 1 experience to @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.3de42d2d3cb78855]{Sojourn} with an automatic strong hit. If you do, you and your allies take one extra recovery move.
